name: SAA Voyager Premium Credit Card
shortDescription: Get the fastest SAA Voyager Miles earn rate on your everyday shopping. Get extraordinary benefits with unprecedented travel rewards. This South African credit card offers you the fastest SAA Voyager Miles earn rate on your everyday spend when using your card for all eligible spend*. In addition, get Premium benefits no matter what class you travel.
extraInfoLine: Get the fastest SAA Voyager Miles earn rate on your everyday shopping.
extraFeatureTextLine: Get the fastest SAA Voyager Miles earn rate on your everyday shopping.

eligibilityRules.description: Is a South African resident or has a valid work permit;
Has a good credit rating; and

salesHighlights: Convenient payments with automated direct debit orders.
Free SMS notifications for transactions over R500.
Automatic and free enrolment to the SAA Voyager programme with the card if you are not a Voyager member yet.
Automatic basic travel insurance of up to R6 000 000.
valueAddedServices: You will always earn Voyager Miles;

Earn one Mile for every R6,00 of eligible spend* on the SAA Voyager American Express® Credit Card or when using the MasterCard cardholders will earn one Mile for every R10,50 of eligible spend* on the SAA Voyager MasterCard Credit Card.
20% discount on international top up travel insurance premiums.
Multiple free additional cards to accelerate the Miles earnrates on spend.
additionalFeatures: Get the fastest Miles earnrates on everyday shopping. Enjoy accelerated SAA Voyager Miles earnrates when using the SAA Voyager American Express® Credit Card.
Automatic and free enrolment to the SAA Voyager programme with the card if you are not a Voyager member yet.
New SAA Voyager members receive 2 500 new enrolment Bonus Miles.
Double Miles on eligible spend* in the first month after the account has been opened.
Get 19 000 Bonus Miles on the first SAA ticket purchased on the card, which is awarded on completion of travel.

Companion ticket: One complimentary SAA Continental Companion Ticket per calendar year (1 January - 31 December) when achieving a spend threshold of R100 000, or a complimentary Global Companion Ticket when reaching a spend threshold of R200 000. No class restrictions.

Unlimited access to SAA-owned Premium departure lounges when travelling on SAA-operated flights or SAA marketing flights where Mango is the operating carrier. Free access for all companion ticket holders to lounges when accompanying the Primary cardholders.

Cardholders do not earn Voyager Miles on: However, please note that there is no cap when using the SAA Voyager American Express® Card and that all eligible spend will contribute towards the annual Companion ticket.

additionalFeatures: Redeem Miles - Spend your Miles at SAA, Star Alliance, Mango, SA Express, Airlink and other non-Star Alliance partners and for upgrades. Alternatively, stay at our accommodation partner, Miles for Style, or hire a car from our car rental partners, such as Avis, Bidvest Car Rental and Europcar. Redemptions can also be used for cruises with one of our partners, such as Cruises International, or at our lifestyle partner, Miles for Style or enjoy pampering at health spas. Have your gifts delivered to your seat on your next flight out, redeem your Miles for on-board purchases with FlySAA Duty Free.
SAA frequently has JourneyBlitz offers where cardholders can book return flights on SAA domestic services for as little as 7 400 Miles and return flights to Europe for only 19 000 Miles.

productFeatures.name: earnrate
productFeatures.description: 1 Mile for every R6.00 on Amex card, 1 Mile for every R10.50 spend on MasterCard card

productFeatures.name: internationallounges
productFeatures.description: Yes, unlimited visits at SAA owned departure lounges

productFeatures.name: companionticket
productFeatures.description: Yes, one Continental or Global companion ticket per calendar year when meeting spend thresholds, and get a secondary Global Companion ticket when spending R1000 000 per calendar year.

productFeatures.name: localairportlounge
productFeatures.description: Yes, unlimited visits at SAA owned departure lounges

productFeatures.name: travelservicesdesk
productFeatures.description: No. There is a dedicated card services Premium desk.

requiredDocuments.attributeName: South African bar-coded identity card or document, or passport and work permit.
Proof of income (latest three months' bank statements reflecting income or latest three months' payslips).
For self-employed clients the above documents as well as a letter from accountant/financial manager confirming income.
